title: Find All Matching Indexes | Challenge
description: In Python, we can use the enumerate() function to iterate over a list and get both the index and the value of each element. We can also use list comprehension to filter elements that satisfy a certain condition. In this challenge, you will use these concepts to create a function that finds the indexes of all elements in a list that satisfy a given testing function.

meta.description: Learn how to use the enumerate() function and list comprehension in Python to find the indexes of all elements in a list that satisfy a given testing function.
